headline: Intuit’s All-in-One Platform Introduces a Virtual Team of AI Agents to Help UK Businesses Increase Efficiency and Growth
summary: LONDON, November 14, 2025--Intuit Inc. (Nasdaq: INTU), the global financial technology platform that makes Intuit TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, and Mailchimp, has today announced the global availability of AI agents on Intuit’s All-in-One platform, creating a more powerful and automated QuickBooks experience designed to deliver time savings, greater efficiency, insights and value for customers. The company also released a new report which highlights the benefits of AI-driven solutions for
